anya-e1203n:302_0: Gantvā so dhammarājā vanamisipatanaṁ saññatānaṁ niketaṁ,
anya-e1203n:310_0: Obhāso pātubhuto sapadi bahuvidhaṁ āsi accherakañca.
anya-e1203n:313_0: Tato paṭṭhāya so satthā vinento devamānuse,
anya-e1203n:319_0: Yakkhānaṁ samitiṁ gantvā ṭhatvāna gagane tahiṁ;
anya-e1203n:335_0: Datvā namassituṁ kese agā jetavanaṁ jino.
anya-e1203n:380_0: So satthā sumane kūṭe dassesi padalañchanaṁ.
anya-e1203n:413_0: Subhaddaṁ majjhime yāme pāpetvā amataṁ padaṁ.
anya-e1203n:427_0: Ahatehi ca vatthehi veṭhetvā paṭhamaṁ jinaṁ;
anya-e1203n:440_0: Citakaṁ taṁ na sakkhiṁsu gāhāpetuṁ hutāsanaṁ.
anya-e1203n:449_0: Na masi satthudehassa daḍḍhassāsi na chārikā.
anya-e1203n:454_0: Uṇhīsaṁ akkhakā dve ca catasso dantadhātuyo;
anya-e1203n:455_0: Iccetā dhātuyo satta vippakiṇṇā na satthuno.
anya-e1203n:476_0: Gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṁ.
anya-e1203n:481_0: Dantadhātuṁ tato khemo attanā gahitaṁ adā;
anya-e1203n:484_0: Desayitvāna so dhammaṁ bhetvā sabbā kudiṭṭhiyo;
anya-e1203n:562_0: Taṁ dhātuṁ pūjayitvāna rājāno pubbakā idha;
anya-e1203n:566_0: Pūjayanti samāgamma dhātuṁ taṁ satthuno iti.
anya-e1203n:568_0: Tassāmaccassa so rājā sutvā dhammaṁ subhāsitaṁ;
anya-e1203n:571_0: Dhātupūjaṁ karonto so rājā acchariyā vahaṁ;
anya-e1203n:578_0: Pabbājesi sakā raṭṭhā nigaṇṭhe te asesake.
anya-e1203n:593_0: Nindanno tādise deve chavaṭṭhiṁ vandate iti.
anya-e1203n:599_0: Pūjitaṁ taṁ chavaṭṭhiñca tena rattindivaṁ iti.
anya-e1203n:607_0: Sutvā āgamanaṁ tassa kaliṅgo so mahipati;
anya-e1203n:616_0: Tato so sumano gantvā paviṭṭho rājamandiraṁ;
anya-e1203n:632_0: Jano hi avajānanto addhā so vañcito iti.
anya-e1203n:638_0: Tena saddhiṁ mahagghaṁ taṁ agamā dhātumandiraṁ.
anya-e1203n:684_0: Accheraṁ taṁ parama ruciraṁ cittayāno narindo,
anya-e1203n:691_0: Taṁ sāsanaṁ paṇḍunarādhipassa ñāpesi dhīro duratikkamaṁ’ti.
anya-e1203n:693_0: Rājātato dantapuraṁ dhajehi pupphehi dhūpehi ca toraṇehi;
anya-e1203n:697_0: Samubbahanto sirasā nijena mahārahaṁ dhātukaraṇḍakaṁ taṁ.
anya-e1203n:708_0: Kaliṅghanātho kusumādikehi naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
anya-e1203n:709_0: Dine dine addhani dantadhātuṁ pūjesi saddhiṁ vanadevatāhi.
anya-e1203n:712_0: Ādāya dhātuṁ manujādhinātho agā puraṁ pāṭali puttanāmaṁ.
anya-e1203n:714_0: Rājādhirājo’tha sabhāya majjhe disvāna taṁ vītabhayaṁ visaṅkaṁ;
anya-e1203n:724_0: Mohandhabhutā atha titthiyā te taṁ dantadhātuṁ abhinikkhipiṁsu.
anya-e1203n:729_0: Tasmiṁ khaṇe paṅkaja kaṇṇikāya patiṭṭhahitvā jinadantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:730_0: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbā disā pabhāsesi pabhassarāhi.
anya-e1203n:732_0: Disvāna taṁ acchariyaṁ manussā pasannacittā ratanādikehi;
anya-e1203n:735_0: So paṇḍurājā pana diṭṭhijālaṁ cirānubaddhaṁ apariccajanto;
anya-e1203n:739_0: Pubbācalaṭṭho’va sudhāmarīci jotesi raṁsīhi disā samantā.
anya-e1203n:741_0: Disvānubhāvaṁ jinadantadhātu yāpajji so vimbhaya maggarājā;
anya-e1203n:742_0: Eko’tha issāpasuto nigaṇṭho taṁ rājarājānamidaṁ avoca.
anya-e1203n:744_0: Rāmādayo deva janaddanassa nānāvatārā bhuvane ahesuṁ;
anya-e1203n:747_0: Addhā manussattamupāgatassa devassa pacchā tidivaṁ gatassa;
anya-e1203n:754_0: Yaṭicchitaṁ gaṇhatha vatthujātaṁ iccāha rājā mukhare nigaṇṭhe.
anya-e1203n:756_0: Te titthiyā viṇahusuraṁ guṇehi vicitta rūpehi abhitthavitvā;
anya-e1203n:757_0: Toyena siñciṁsu saṭhā tathāpi ṭhitappadesā na calittha dhātu.
anya-e1203n:759_0: Jigucchamāno atha te nigaṇṭhe so dhātuyānīharaṇe upāyaṁ;
anya-e1203n:760_0: Anvesamāno vasudhādhinātho bheriṁ carāpesi sake puramhi.
anya-e1203n:766_0: Tasmiṁ pure seṭṭhisuto subhaddo pāvekkhirañño samitiṁ pagabbho.
anya-e1203n:768_0: Tamaggarājaṁ atha so namitvā sāmājikānaṁ hadayaṅgamāya;
anya-e1203n:771_0: Bhumiṁ kiṇitvā mahatā dhanena manoramaṁ jetavanaṁ vihāraṁ;
anya-e1203n:772_0: Yo kārayitvāna jinassa datvā upaṭṭhahi taṁ catupaccayehi.
anya-e1203n:780_0: Chaddantanāgo savisena viddho sallena yo lohitamakkhi taṅgo;
anya-e1203n:781_0: Chabbaṇṇaraṁsīhi samujjalante chetvāna luddāya adāsi dante.
anya-e1203n:786_0: Yo bodhiyā bāhiravatthudānā atittarūpo sivirāja seṭṭho;
anya-e1203n:787_0: Adāsi cakkhūni pabhassarāni dvijāya jiṇṇāya acakkhukāya.
anya-e1203n:792_0: Yo dhammapālo api sattamāsa jātopaduṭṭhe janakesakamhi;
anya-e1203n:793_0: Kārāpayante asimālakammaṁ cittaṁ na dūsesi patāparāje.
anya-e1203n:795_0: Sākhāmigo yo asatā pumena vane papātā sayamuddhaṭena;
anya-e1203n:796_0: Silāya bhinne’pi sake lalāṭe taṁ khemabhumiṁ anayitthamūḷhaṁ.
anya-e1203n:799_0: Samuṭṭhite sajjumahāravinde ṭhatvāna yo seṭṭhi adāsi dānaṁ.
anya-e1203n:804_0: Yo sattavasso visikhāya paṁsu kīḷāparo sambhavanāmako’pi;
anya-e1203n:807_0: Hitvā nikantiṁ sakajīvite’pi baddhāsakucchimhi ca vettavalliṁ;
anya-e1203n:811_0: Isī’va katvā atha ñāyaganthaṁ nijaṁ pavattesi cirāya dhammaṁ.
anya-e1203n:825_0: Buddho bhavitvā api diṭṭhadhamma sukhānapekkho karuṇānuvattī;
anya-e1203n:829_0: Ajeyyasatthaṁ paramiddhipattaṁ damesi yo ālavakampī yakkhaṁ.
anya-e1203n:832_0: Bhetvāna diṭṭhiṁ sucirānubaddhaṁ damesi yo brahmavaraṁ munindo.
anya-e1203n:838_0: Mahādayo duppasahaṁ parehi damesi yo aṅgulimālacoraṁ.
anya-e1203n:841_0: Saddhamma saññaṁ ratanākarañca ogāhayī saṁ parisaṁ samaggaṁ.
anya-e1203n:846_0: Anena saccena jinassa dhātu khippaṁ samāruyha nabhantarāḷaṁ;
anya-e1203n:849_0: Tasmiṁ khaṇe sā jinadantadhātu nabhaṁ samuggamma pabhāsayantī;
anya-e1203n:850_0: Sabbā disā osadhitārakā’va janaṁ pasādesi vtiṇṇakaṅkhaṁ.
anya-e1203n:852_0: Athotaritvā gaganaṅgaṇamhā sā matthake seṭṭhisutassa tassa;
anya-e1203n:855_0: Dasvāna taṁ acchariyaṁ nigaṇṭhā iccabravuṁ paṇḍunarādhipaṁ taṁ;
anya-e1203n:856_0: Vijjābalaṁ seṭṭhisutassa etaṁ na dhātuyā deva ayampabhāvo.
anya-e1203n:858_0: Nisamma tesaṁ vacanaṁ narindo iccabravī seṭṭhisutaṁ subhaddaṁ;
anya-e1203n:859_0: Yathā ca ete abhisaddaheyyuṁ tathāvidhaṁ dassaya iddhimaññaṁ.
anya-e1203n:864_0: Sā rājahaṁ sī’va vidhāvamānā sugandhitoyamhi padakkhiṇena;
anya-e1203n:865_0: Ummujjamānā ca nimujjamānā jane pamodassudhare akāsi.
anya-e1203n:867_0: Tato ca kāsuṁ visikhāyamajjhe katvā tahiṁ dhātumabhikkhipitvā;
anya-e1203n:868_0: Paṁsūhi sammā abhipūrayitvā bahūhi maddāpayi kuñjarehi.
anya-e1203n:874_0: Obhāsayanti’va disā pabhāhi diṭṭhā muhuttena jinassadhātu.
anya-e1203n:876_0: Khipiṁsu vatthābharaṇāni maccā pavassayuṁ pupphamayañca vassaṁ;
anya-e1203n:877_0: Ukkuṭṭhisaddehi ca sadhukāranādehi puṇṇaṁ nagaraṁ akaṁsu.
anya-e1203n:879_0: Te titthiyā taṁ abhivañcanaṁ’ti rājādhirājaṁ atha saññapetvā;
anya-e1203n:880_0: Jigucchanīye kuṇapādikehi khipiṁsu dhātuṁ parikhāya piṭṭhe.
anya-e1203n:883_0: Madhubbatālī virutābhirāmā ahosi sā pokkharaṇī’va nandā.
anya-e1203n:885_0: Gajādhipā koññcaravaṁ raviṁsu kariṁsu hesāninadaṁ turaṅgā;
anya-e1203n:889_0: Vatthāni sīse bhamayiṁsu mattā bhujāni poṭhesumudaggacittā.
anya-e1203n:895_0: Atthe niyojetu mupecca tassa vadiṁsu paṇḍussa narādhipassa.
anya-e1203n:897_0: Disvāna yo īdisakampi rāja iddhānubhāvaṁ munipuṅgavassa;
anya-e1203n:898_0: Pasādamattampi kareyya noce kimatthiyā tassa bhaveyya paññā.
anya-e1203n:900_0: Pasādanīyesu guṇesu rāja pasādanaṁ sādhujanassa dhammo;
anya-e1203n:901_0: Pupphanti sabbe sayameva vande samuggate komudakānanāni.
anya-e1203n:903_0: Vācāya tesaṁ pana dummatīnaṁ mā saggamaggaṁ pajahittha rāja;
anya-e1203n:904_0: Andhe gahetvā vicareyya ko hi anvesamāno supathaṁ amūḷho.
anya-e1203n:906_0: Narādhipā kappiṇa bimbisāra suddhodanādi api tejavantā;
anya-e1203n:907_0: Taṁ dhammarājaṁ saraṇaṁ upecca piviṁsu dhammāmatamādarena.
anya-e1203n:910_0: Upecca dhammaṁ vimalaṁ nisamma alattha āyuṁ api diṭṭhadhammo.
anya-e1203n:916_0: Senāpatiṁ atthavaraṁ avoca pahaṭṭhabhāvo parisāya majjhe.
anya-e1203n:919_0: Cirāya dulladdhipathe caranto ṭhito sarajje api vañcitohaṁ.
anya-e1203n:921_0: Mohena khajjopanakaṁ dhamesiṁ sītaddito dhumasikhe jalante;
anya-e1203n:922_0: Pipāsito sindhujalaṁ pahāya piviṁ pamādena marīcitoyaṁ.
anya-e1203n:924_0: Pariccajitvā amataṁ cirāya jivatthiko tikkhavisaṁ akhādiṁ;
anya-e1203n:927_0: Gantvāna khippaṁ parikhā samīpaṁ ārādhayitvā jinadantadhātuṁ;
anya-e1203n:928_0: Ānehi pūjāvidhinā karissaṁ puññāni sabbattha sukhāvahāni.
anya-e1203n:931_0: Dhātuṁ munindassa namassamāno ajjhesi rañño hitamā caranto
anya-e1203n:933_0: Cirāgataṁ diṭṭhimalaṁ pahāya alattha saddhaṁ sugate narindo;
anya-e1203n:936_0: Tasmiṁ khaṇe pokkharaṇī vicittā phullehi sovaṇṇasaroruhehi;
anya-e1203n:940_0: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbaṁ khirodakucchiṁ’va puraṁ akāsi.
anya-e1203n:943_0: Sandissamānā mahatā janena mahapphalaṁ mānusakaṁ akattha.
anya-e1203n:954_0: Vīmaṁsanatthāya tavādhunāpi mayā kataṁ sabbamidaṁ muninda;
anya-e1203n:955_0: Āguṁ mahantaṁ khama bhuripañña khippaṁ mamālaṅkuru uttamaṅgaṁ.
anya-e1203n:957_0: Patiṭṭhitā tassa tato kirīṭe maṇippabhā bhāsini dantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:958_0: Amuñci raṁsī dhavalā pajāsu sinehajātā iva khīradhārā.
anya-e1203n:964_0: Patiṭṭhapetvāna jinassa dhātuṁ pūjesi rājā ratanādikehi.
anya-e1203n:967_0: Hitvā vihiṁsaṁ karuṇādhivāso ārādhayī sabbajanaṁ guṇehi.
anya-e1203n:972_0: Vaḍḍhesi so dhātugharamhi dhātuṁ alaṅkaritvā sakalaṁ purampi;
anya-e1203n:973_0: Sesena pūjāvidhinā atitto pūjesi raṭṭhaṁ sadhanaṁ sabhoggaṁ.
anya-e1203n:1020_0: Nikhila guṇa nivāso so kumāro karitvā;
anya-e1203n:1051_0: Nahi sati mama dehe dhātumaññassa dassaṁ,
anya-e1203n:1052_0: Ahamapi yadi jetuṁ neva te sakkuṇeyyaṁ.
anya-e1203n:1059_0: Tavaca mamaca ko vā sīhaḷe bandhubhūto,
anya-e1203n:1069_0: Mama ca piyasahāyo so mahāsena rājā,
anya-e1203n:1087_0: Turita turita bhūto so puramhā paḷāyi.
anya-e1203n:1258_0: Itthaṁ buddhisute bhujaṅgajanitaṁ bhītiṁ sametvā gate,
anya-e1203n:1259_0: Sā nāvā pavanā pakampitadhajā tuṅgaṁ taraṅgāvaliṁ;
anya-e1203n:1287_0: Sabbā disā ca vidisā ca ghanandhakārā
anya-e1203n:1483_0: Sabbe’pi te atha nikāya nivāsi bhikkhū,
anya-e1203n:1489_0: Rājā avo ca puna bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe;
anya-e1203n:1550_0: Tuṭṭhā tahiṁ yatigaṇā manujā ca sabbe,
